attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Autonomy is defined as the "freedom from control or influence of another or others" 

Every person has the right to make personal and private decisions that affect their own lives, yet are then denied that same right in the decision making of the way they should die. 

The individual should have the right to dictate when they die and in what circumstances they do so with the required medical support.

To deny an individual the choice of accepting death by active euthanasia is to force them to do something that is against their will and in doing so may prolong their suffering as well as violating their dignity and decency.
